text: (he nabee!) unase kahoh kya tumane isapar vichaar kiya hai ki allaah ne tumhaare lie, jo jeevika utaaree hai, tumane usamen se kuchh ko haraam (avaidh) bana diya hai aur kuchh ko halaal (vaidh) , to kaho ki kya allaah ne tumhen isakee anumati dee hai? athava tum allaah par aarop laga rahe[1] ho
